name: Sayaji
desc: Celebrate Indore's heritage at the luxurious Sayaji, featuring multiple restaurants with global cuisines & the Grand Lounge bar. Hotel Sayaji reflects the true spirit of Indore, Central India's financial capital, in the way it brings together tradition and contemporary luxury. Major tourist destinations in the city, like Vijay Nagar and Khajrana Ganesh Temple, are within 5 km of the hotel.
